currentLevel.title: Build Your Business & Balance Your Books
currentLevel.description: Start with some money and build your lemonade stand by buying what you need!

gameData.scene: üéØ Welcome to Lucy's Interactive Lemonade Stand Builder! You have some money to start with - some is your own savings (equity) and some is borrowed from your parents (loan). Your mission is to spend wisely and build the perfect lemonade stand while keeping your books balanced!
gameData.prompt: You start with ‚Çπ300 total (‚Çπ200 from your savings + ‚Çπ100 loan from parents). Buy everything you need for your lemonade stand and watch how each purchase affects your balance sheet. Remember: Assets = Liabilities + Equity!
hints: You have ‚Çπ300 total to spend: ‚Çπ200 of your own money (equity) + ‚Çπ100 loan (liability)
Every item you buy becomes an asset, but your cash (also an asset) goes down

data.instructions: Start shopping! Every purchase shows you how the balance sheet equation works in real life.
